comment.author: 74810491@N07
comment._content: On Sinclair Island in Chance Harbour, Pictou County there is a small beach beside the wharf that has very similar rock formations, although erosion has taken its toll on the shoreline.

comment.author: 68221252@N08
comment._content: What is she looking at?  Could possibly provide a clue to time.

comment.author: 63463553@N07
comment._content: A sensible era when beach time was not considered tan time. This pre-sun screen attire afforded protection from the sun.
